test.name: select unix_timestamp
test.origin: select unix_timestamp(current_timestamp()) * 1000 as c_timestamp
test.target: null

test.name: 多表Delete4
test.origin: delete from mv using mv left join track on mv.mvid=track.trkid where track.trkid is null
test.target: delete from mv using mv left join track on mv.mvid=track.trkid and track.tenant_id=1 where track.trkid is null and mv.tenant_id=1

test.target: delete mv from mv left join track on mv.mvid=track.trkid and track.tenant_id=1 where track.trkid is null and mv.tenant_id=1

test.target: delete from mv using mv,track where track.trkid=mv.mvid and mv.tenant_id=1 and track.tenant_id=1

test.origin: delete mv from mv,track where track.trkid=mv.mvid
test.target: delete mv from mv,track where track.trkid=mv.mvid and mv.tenant_id=1 and track.tenant_id=1

test.name: 多表Update5
test.origin: update s,c set s.class_name='test00',c.stu_name='test00' from student s,class c where s.class_id = c.id
test.target: update s,c set s.class_name='test00',c.stu_name='test00',s.tenant_id=1,c.tenant_id=1 from student s,class c where s.class_id = c.id and s.tenant_id=1 And c.tenant_id=1

test.name: 多表Update4
test.origin: update s,c set s.class_name='test00',c.stu_name='test00' from student s,class c where s.class_id = c.id
test.target: update s,c set s.class_name='test00',c.stu_name='test00' from student s,class c where s.class_id = c.id and s.tenant_id=1 And c.tenant_id=1

test.name: 多表Update3
test.origin: update student s,class c set s.class_name='test00',c.stu_name='test00' where s.class_id = c.id
test.target: update student s,class c set s.class_name='test00',c.stu_name='test00' where s.class_id = c.id and s.tenant_id=1 And c.tenant_id=1

test.name: 多表Update3
test.origin: update student s join class c on s.class_id = c.id set s.class_name='test11'
test.target: update student s join class c on s.class_id = c.id set s.class_name='test11' WHERE s.tenant_id=1 And c.tenant_id=1

test.name: 多表Update2
test.origin: UPDATE student s LEFT JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.id SET s.class_name='test22',c.stu_name='test22'
test.target: UPDATE student s LEFT JOIN class c ON s.class_id = c.id and c.tenant_id=1 SET s.class_name='test22',c.stu_name='test22' WHERE s.tenant_id=1

test.name: 多表Update1
test.origin: update student left join class on student.class_id = class.id set student.class_name='test22',class.stu_name='test22'
test.target: update student left join class on student.class_id = class.id and class.tenant_id=1 set student.class_name='test22',class.stu_name='test22' where student.tenant_id=1

test.name: 多表Insert first when
多表Insert all when
多表Insert all
test.origin: INSERT ALL INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name) VALUES (1000, 'IBM') INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name) VALUES (2000, 'Microsoft') INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name) VALUES (3000, 'Google') SELECT * FROM dual;
test.target: INSERT ALL INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name,tenant_id) VALUES (1000, 'IBM',1) INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name,tenant_id) VALUES (2000, 'Microsoft',1) INTO suppliers (supplier_id, supplier_name,tenant_id) VALUES (3000, 'Google',1) SELECT * FROM dual WHERE dual.tenant_id = 1;

test.name: qq用户（732811911）提交
test.origin: UPDATE chart_view cv, chart_view_cache cve SET cv.` NAME ` = cve.` NAME `, cv.title = cve.title, cv.scene_id = cve.scene_id WHERE cve.ID = cv.ID AND cv.ID IN ( ?, ? )
test.target: UPDATE chart_view cv, chart_view_cache cve SET cv.` NAME ` = cve.` NAME `, cv.title = cve.title, cv.scene_id = cve.scene_id WHERE cve.ID = cv.ID AND cv.ID IN (?, ?) AND cv.tenant_id = 1 AND cve.tenant_id = 1

test.name: 更新语句set value中的查询
test.origin: UPDATE Persons SET PersonCityName=(SELECT AddressList.PostCode FROM AddressList WHERE AddressList.PersonId = Persons.PersonId)
test.target: UPDATE Persons SET PersonCityName=(SELECT AddressList.PostCode FROM AddressList WHERE AddressList.PersonId = Persons.PersonId AND AddressList.tenant_id = 1), tenant_id=1 WHERE Persons.tenant_id = 1

test.name: queryInInsert
test.origin: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerName, City, Country) SELECT SupplierName, City, Country FROM Suppliers s
test.target: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerName, City, Country) SELECT SupplierName, City, Country FROM Suppliers s WHERE s.tenant_id = 1

test.name: queryInInsert
test.origin: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerName, City, Country) SELECT SupplierName, City, Country FROM Suppliers
test.target: INSERT INTO Customers (CustomerName, City, Country) SELECT SupplierName, City, Country FROM Suppliers WHERE Suppliers.tenant_id = 1

test.name: selectTest
test.origin: select * from people
test.target: select * from people where people.tenant_id=1

test.name: leftJoinTest
test.origin: select p.* from people p left join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id
test.target: select p.* from people p left join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id and d.tenant_id=1 where p.tenant_id=1

test.name: rightJoinTest
test.origin: select p.* from people p right join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id
test.target: select p.* from people p right join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id and p.tenant_id=1 where d.tenant_id=1

test.name: innerJoinTest
test.origin: select p.* from people p join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id
test.target: select p.* from people p join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id where p.tenant_id=1 and d.tenant_id=1

test.name: outerJoinTest
test.origin: select p.* from people p full join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id
test.target: select p.* from people p full join dept d on p.dept_id = d.dept_id and p.tenant_id=1 and d.tenant_id=1
